title: Pluto: After nearly a decade of losing, Akron football shows progress
teaser: The University of Akron's football team hasn't had a winning season in nearly a decade. During that time, the university built a $60 million dollar stadium and went through a handful of coaches. And, it saw MAC rival Kent State go to a bowl game in 2012. Now, Akron is starting to show signs of progress. WKSU commentator Terry Pluto talks about a team that's gradually finding success after years of losing. WKSU's Amanda Rabinowitz reports.
